description: Enjoy an easy walk around this pleasant area of woodland on the outskirts of Doncaster . The woods include a car park, visitor centre and a circular trail with lots of wildlife to look out for on the way. You can find the woods just to the east of the town centre, next to Doncaster racecourse. The woods border the adjacent Cantley Park where there's a walking trail with more woodlands, wildlife and ponds.
